statements: SELECT * FROM retargeting_campaigns;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM retargeting_campaigns WHERE status = 'ACTIVE';
SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name FROM retargeting_campaigns WHERE start_date <= '2022-01-01';
SELECT campaign_name, budget FROM retargeting_campaigns WHERE budget > 5000;
SELECT * FROM retargeting_campaigns WHERE targeting_criteria LIKE '%product%' ORDER BY budget DESC, start_date ASC;
SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name, start_date, end_date, budget, status FROM retargeting_campaigns WHERE status = 'Active';
SELECT * FROM retargeting_campaigns WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01' AND end_date < '2022-12-31';
SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name, targeting_criteria, budget FROM retargeting_campaigns WHERE status = 'Inactive' ORDER BY budget DESC;
SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name, start_date, end_date, status FROM retargeting_campaigns WHERE budget >= 5000 AND targeting_criteria LIKE '%retail%';
SELECT campaign_name, budget, status FROM retargeting_campaigns WHERE status = 'Active' OR status = 'Paused' ORDER BY start_date ASC, budget DESC;
SELECT * FROM customer_interaction_data LIMIT 5;
SELECT customer_id, interaction_time, interaction_type FROM customer_interaction_data WHERE customer_id = 10;
SELECT * FROM retargeting_campaigns WHERE campaign_start_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name, campaign_start_date FROM retargeting_campaigns ORDER BY campaign_start_date DESC;
SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name, target_audience FROM retargeting_campaigns WHERE target_audience = 'New Customers';
SELECT * FROM customer_interaction_data WHERE interaction_type = 'positive' ORDER BY interaction_time DESC;
SELECT customer_id, interaction_type, interaction_details FROM customer_interaction_data WHERE customer_id = 12345;
SELECT * FROM customer_interaction_data WHERE DATE(interaction_time) = '2022-07-15';
SELECT interaction_type, COUNT(*) AS interaction_count FROM customer_interaction_data GROUP BY interaction_type;
SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name, target_audience FROM retargeting_campaigns WHERE campaign_start_date <= '2022-08-01' AND campaign_end_date > '2022-08-01';
SELECT * FROM retargeting_campaigns;
SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name FROM retargeting_campaigns WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT interaction_id, customer_id, interaction_date FROM customer_interactions ORDER BY interaction_date ASC;
SELECT campaign_id, interaction_id, interaction_result FROM campaign_interactions WHERE interaction_result = 'success';
SELECT * FROM retargeting_campaigns WHERE end_date <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM retargeting_campaigns ORDER BY campaign_id DESC;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM retargeting_campaigns WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01';

SELECT campaign_name, interaction_type FROM retargeting_campaigns, customer_interactions, campaign_interactions WHERE retargeting_campaigns.campaign_id = campaign_interactions.campaign_id AND campaign_interactions.interaction_id = customer_interactions.interaction_id;
SELECT campaign_name, SUM(DATEDIFF(end_date, start_date)) AS total_campaign_duration FROM retargeting_campaigns GROUP BY campaign_name;
SELECT DISTINCT interaction_type FROM customer_interactions WHERE customer_id = 123 ORDER BY interaction_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT interaction_type, interaction_date FROM interactions WHERE customer_id = 3 ORDER BY interaction_date DESC;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM campaigns WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01' AND end_date < '2022-12-31';

SELECT campaign_name, COUNT(interaction_id) AS total_interactions FROM campaigns c JOIN campaign_interactions ci ON c.campaign_id = ci.campaign_id GROUP BY campaign_name ORDER BY total_interactions DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT name, email FROM customers WHERE name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT customers.name, interactions.interaction_type FROM customers INNER JOIN interactions ON customers.customer_id = interactions.customer_id;
SELECT DISTINCT interactions.interaction_type FROM interactions WHERE interaction_date > '2022-01-01';

SELECT customers.name, campaigns.campaign_name FROM customers INNER JOIN campaign_interactions ON customers.customer_id = campaign_interactions.campaign_id INNER JOIN campaigns ON campaign_interactions.campaign_id = campaigns.campaign_id ORDER BY campaigns.start_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM interactions;
SELECT interaction_id, customer_id, interaction_date FROM interactions WHERE interaction_type = 'Meeting';
SELECT first_name, last_name, email, phone_number FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1001;
SELECT * FROM campaigns WHERE end_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT campaign_name, budget FROM campaigns WHERE budget > 5000;
SELECT * FROM interactions WHERE customer_id = 100 ORDER BY interaction_date DESC;
SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name, email FROM customers WHERE last_name LIKE 'S%' AND phone_number IS NOT NULL;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, budget FROM campaigns WHERE budget > 5000;
SELECT interaction_id, interaction_date, interaction_details FROM interactions WHERE interaction_type = 'Meeting' AND interaction_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT campaign_name, result_date, result_type FROM campaigns c JOIN campaign_results cr ON c.campaign_id = cr.campaign_id WHERE result_type = 'Conversion';
